name: Purification (Enguenye)
description:
The cascade, your home, has been invaded by monsters . Defeat the monsters and purify the cascade back to its normal state.

Use the WASD keys to move and the mouse to shoot.

A game made by Joselco99 and Enguenye.

Music used:

Future Glider-Brian Bolger

Window Demos-Roljui

Nightmares Inn-RKVC

Sounds taken from:

https://freesound.org/
